description: Test data organized by endpoint with request data and expected response values for validation

common._comment: Common data shared across multiple endpoints
common._instructions: Add any common data here that is reused across multiple endpoints

endpoints._comment: Organize test data by endpoint path (without /api/ prefix and version)

request._comment: Request body or query parameters for this endpoint

expectedInResponse._comment: Expected values in the response for validation
expectedInResponse._instructions: Use dot notation for nested fields: response.data.id

your-endpoint/v1/resource._comment: Human-readable description of what this endpoint does

request._comment: For path parameters, include them here

your-endpoint/v1/getById._comment: This endpoint retrieves a specific resource by ID

your-endpoint/v1/listing._comment: This endpoint returns a paginated list of resources

your-endpoint/v1/update._comment: Update operations should include the ID of the resource being updated

your-endpoint/v1/delete._comment: Delete operations typically return a success message

structure.common: Shared data that can be referenced using {{common.fieldName}} syntax
structure.endpoints: Test data organized by endpoint path (without /api/ prefix)
structure.request: Input data for the API request (body params, query params, or path params)
structure.expectedInResponse: Expected values to validate in the response

validation.nested_fields: Use dot notation for nested fields: 'response.data.user.id'
validation.null_check: Use null to validate null values: 'error': null

naming.endpoint_key: Use the endpoint path without /api/ prefix as the key

_instructions.usage: Copy this file to testData.json and customize with your API test data
